thankyou so much sledge.nobody else has put this up.i can't believe it.i think only one other guy put it up and his file is like 75gb.thats crazy it would take forever to download that.i will seed this till the cows come home.
wow, what a great idea!  is this all of the extras from the box set, or just the "main" documentaries?  thanks either way!
The other main extras (deleted scenes and spoofs) are already available in other releases/torrents so I did not feel the need to include them.
